title: Portal: run status and mode summary (local vs GCP speed/low cost)
scope: Show a clear run status model (queued/running/succeeded/failed) for MVP runs.
Display which deployment mode produced the bundle (gcp_speed, gcp_low_cost, local_laptop).
Surface failure reasons and telemetry highlights (runtime, frames, SAM budget).
acceptance: Portal displays run status and mode prominently on run detail pages.
Failure reasons are actionable and link to logs/evidence when available.
Telemetry summary is shown without requiring deep log inspection.

deliverables.title: Portal run detail status/telemetry surface
acceptance: Run detail page shows status/mode/telemetry and links to artifacts.
Telemetry parsing is safe and deterministic.

subtasks.title: Implement run detail page and telemetry extraction.
done_when: run_telemetry.js extracts a compact summary safely.
